data.title: Labor Force
data.text:
Talent Pool

Organized development programs that benefit our university/college structure and encourage them to act in concert with common goals are active in our market area.

CERT (Consortium of Education, Research, and Technology) takes a primary role in developing existing and cutting edge programs for different curriculum structures within our market. These programs are essential to our talent pool development.

A sampling of these ground-breaking talent development programs include:

Student Business Incubator at Bossier Parish Community College

Cisco Networking Academy

Aviation Maintenance Technology/Aviation Sciences

Louisiana Scholars College

CENIT (Center for Entrepreneurship and Information Technology)

University

Enrollment

Ayers Career College

Northwest Louisiana Technical College

982

Northwestern State University

11,447

Remington College

348

Southern University at Shreveport

3,013
